targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "$measurement" and r._field == "ha_temperature" and r.box =~ /^${boxtag}$/)
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({"": r._value, _measurement: r.name}))

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "$measurement" and r._field == "ha_temperature" and r.box =~ /^${boxtag}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: median)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _field: r.name, _value: r._value}))

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "$measurement" and r._field == "ha_heating_tist" and r.box =~ /^${boxtag}$/ and r._value < 253)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: median)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _field: r.name + " (actual)", _value: r._value}))

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "$measurement" and r._field == "ha_heating_tsoll" and r.box =~ /^${boxtag}$/ and r._value < 253)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: first)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _field: r.name + " (set)", _value: r._value}))

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "$measurement" and r._field == "ha_heating_boostactive" and r.box =~ /^${boxtag}$/)
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({Device: r.name, Boost: r._value}))

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "$measurement" and r._field == "ha_heating_summeractive" and r.box =~ /^${boxtag}$/)
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({Device: r.name, Summer: r._value}))

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "$measurement" and r._field == "ha_heating_holidayactive" and r.box =~ /^${boxtag}$/)
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({Device: r.name, Holiday: r._value}))

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "$measurement" and r._field == "ha_heating_lock" and r.box =~ /^${boxtag}$/)
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({Device: r.name, Locked: r._value}))

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "$measurement" and r._field == "ha_heating_devicelock" and r.box =~ /^${boxtag}$/)
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({Device: r.name, "Device Locked": r._value}))

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "$measurement" and r._field == "ha_heating_tist" and r.box =~ /^${boxtag}$/)
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({Device: r.name, "Temp ist": r._value}))

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "$measurement" and r._field == "ha_heating_tsoll" and r.box =~ /^${boxtag}$/)
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({Device: r.name, "Temp soll": r._value}))

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "$measurement" and r._field == "ha_heating_komfort" and r.box =~ /^${boxtag}$/)
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({Device: r.name, "Temp komfort": r._value}))

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "$measurement" and r._field == "ha_heating_absenk" and r.box =~ /^${boxtag}$/)
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({Device: r.name, "Temp absenk": r._value}))

panels.title: Last heating device modes and temperatures

targets.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "$measurement" and r._field == "ha_heating_battery" and r.box =~ /^${boxtag}$/)
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({"": r._value, _measurement: r.name}))

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "$measurement" and r._field =~ /^ha_heating_windowopenactive?$/ and r.box =~ /^${boxtag}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: first)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _field: r.name, _value: if r._value != 0 then true else false}))

import "strings"

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "$measurement" and r._field == "ha_powermeter_power" and r.box =~ /^${boxtag}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: r._value, _measurement: r.name, _field: strings.replaceAll(v: r._field, t: "ha_powermeter_", u: "")}))

import "strings"

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "$measurement" and r._field == "ha_powermeter_voltage" and r.box =~ /^${boxtag}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: r._value, _measurement: r.name, _field: strings.replaceAll(v: r._field, t: "ha_powermeter_", u: "")}))

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: -12h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r.box =~ /^${boxtag}$/ and 
    (
      r._field == "ha_fw_version" or
      r._field == "ha_product_name" or
      r._field == "ha_manufacturer" or
      r._field == "ha_devicefunctions" or
      r._field == "ha_hun_fun_interfaces" or
      r._field == "ha_hun_fun_unittype" or
      r._field == "ha_device_present" or 
      r._field == "ha_device_present"
    )
  )
  |> last()
  |> drop(columns: ["box", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop", "_time"])

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: -12h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "${measurement}" and r.box =~ /^${boxtag}$/ and 
    (
      r._field == "ha_battery_percent" or
      r._field == "ha_product_name" or
      r._field == "ha_battery_low" or
      r._field == "ha_switch_state" or
      r._field == "ha_switch_mode" or
      r._field == "ha_switch_lock" or
      r._field == "ha_switch_devicelock" or 
      r._field == "ha_simpleonoff_state"
    )
  )
  |> last()
  |> drop(columns: ["box", "_measurement", "_start", "_stop", "_time"])

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "$measurement" and r._field =~ /^ha_switch_state$/ and r.box =~ /^${boxtag}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: first)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _field: r.name, _value: if r._value != 0 then true else false}))

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "$measurement" and r._field =~ /^ha_simpleonoff_state$/ and r.box =~ /^${boxtag}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: first)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _field: r.name, _value: if r._value != 0 then true else false}))

from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "$measurement" and r._field =~ /^ha_alert$/ and r.box =~ /^${boxtag}$/)
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: first)
  |> fill(usePrevious: true)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _field: r.name, _value: if r._value != 0 then true else false}))

list.definition:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "$measurement" and r._field =~ /^ha_.*/)
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["box"])
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["box"])
  |> distinct(column: "box")
list.label: FritzBox
list.name: boxtag
list.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "$measurement" and r._field =~ /^ha_.*/)
  |> keyValues(keyColumns: ["box"])
  |> group()
  |> keep(columns: ["box"])
  |> distinct(column: "box")

list.description: Measurement name for the fritzflux data
list.label: InfluxDB measurement
list.name: measurement
